example: These immigrants that speak Spanish are called Hispanics.
Their work supports the United States economy.
Many new lifestyles and cultures began in the United States.
The automobile became the symbol of American Society.
People in the US are large consumers of goods from around the world.
The United Nations headquarters is located in New York.
Wall Street is a world-famous financial center.
Broadway is famous for its high-quality musicals.
The US invented movies, theme parks, and fast food.

kana: さいしんのふぁっしょん
example: New York is a place where you can find the latest fashion.
